vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συναρμολογέω,
compagino, [Refs]:—passive, to be fitted or framed together, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to be joined together, fit together join
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be joined together, fit together join
to join together fitly, fit, or frame together, compact, Eph. 2:21; 4:16*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 連結在一起
1a) 建築物, 身體的部位 (弗 2:21, 4:16)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 连结在一起
1a) 建筑物, 身体的部位 (弗 2:21, 4:16)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sắp đặt cách hẳn hoi. σύν (G4862) + ἁρμός (G719) + λέγω (G3004)
